text.section: There is a Jane E. Lawton Conservation Fund.
The Administration shall administer the Fund.

section.section: The Fund is a special, nonlapsing fund that is not subject to § 7-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
The State Treasurer shall hold the Fund and the Comptroller shall account for the Fund.

text.section:
The Fund may be used only:
to pay the expenses of the Program; and
to provide loans to eligible borrowers and projects.

section.section: The State Treasurer shall invest and reinvest the money of the Fund in the same manner as other State money may be invested.
Any investment earnings of the Fund shall be paid into the Fund.
Any repayment of principal and interest on loans made from the Fund shall be paid into the Fund.
The Administration shall annually reserve a portion of the money from the Fund that is available for financial assistance under the Program for loans to nonprofit organizations.

In a fiscal year in which requests for financial assistance from nonprofit organizations are less than the amount of money reserved under paragraph (1) of this subsection, the Administration may make the unencumbered or noncommitted portion of the reserve available to other borrowers in the Program.
